00027 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00028 
00031 
00032 
00034 template <class BlockType>
00035 class write_pool
00036 {
00037 public:
00038     typedef BlockType block_type;
00039     typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00040 
00041     // a hack to make wait_any work with busy_entry type
00042     struct busy_entry
00043     {
00044         block_type * block;
00045         request_ptr req;
00046         bid_type bid;
00047 
00048         busy_entry() : block(NULL) { }
00049         busy_entry(const busy_entry &a) : block(a.block), req(a.req), bid(a.bid) { }
00050         busy_entry(block_type * &bl, request_ptr & r, bid_type & bi) :
00051             block(bl), req(r), bid(bi) { }
00052 
00053         operator request_ptr () { return req; }
00054     };
00055     //typedef __gnu_cxx::hash_map < bid_type, request_ptr , bid_hash > hash_map_type;
00056     //typedef typename hash_map_type::iterator block_track_iterator;
00057     typedef typename std::list<block_type *>::iterator free_blocks_iterator;
00058     typedef typename std::list<busy_entry>::iterator busy_blocks_iterator;
00059 protected:
00060 
00061     // contains free write blocks
00062     std::list<block_type *> free_blocks;
00063     // blocks that are in writing
00064     std::list<busy_entry> busy_blocks;
00065 
00066     //hash_map_type block_track;
00067 
00068     unsigned_type free_blocks_size, busy_blocks_size;
00069 
00070 private:
00071     write_pool(const write_pool &);     // forbidden
00072     write_pool & operator=(const write_pool &);    // forbidden
00073 public:
00076     explicit write_pool(unsigned_type init_size = 1) : free_blocks_size(init_size), busy_blocks_size(0)
00077     {
00078         unsigned_type i = 0;
00079         for ( ; i < init_size; ++i)
00080             free_blocks.push_back(new block_type);
00081     }
00082 
00083     void swap(write_pool & obj)
00084     {
00085         std::swap(free_blocks, obj.free_blocks);
00086         std::swap(busy_blocks, obj.busy_blocks);
00087         std::swap(free_blocks_size, obj.free_blocks_size);
00088         std::swap(busy_blocks_size, busy_blocks_size);
00089     }
00090 
00092     virtual ~write_pool()
00093     {
00094         STXXL_VERBOSE2("write_pool::~write_pool free_blocks_size: " <<
00095                        free_blocks_size << " busy_blocks_size: " << busy_blocks_size);
00096         while (!free_blocks.empty())
00097         {
00098             delete free_blocks.back();
00099             free_blocks.pop_back();
00100         }
00101 
00102         try
00103         {
00104             busy_blocks_iterator i2 = busy_blocks.begin();
00105             for ( ; i2 != busy_blocks.end(); ++i2)
00106             {
00107                 i2->req->wait();
00108                 delete i2->block;
00109             }
00110         }
00111         catch (...)
00112         { }
00113     }
00114 
00116     unsigned_type size() const { return free_blocks_size + busy_blocks_size; }
00117 
00124     request_ptr write(block_type * block, bid_type bid)
00125     {
00126         request_ptr result = block->write(bid);
00127         ++busy_blocks_size;
00128         busy_blocks.push_back(busy_entry(block, result, bid));
00129         return result;
00130     }
00131 
00134     block_type * steal()
00135     {
00136         assert(size() > 0);
00137         if (free_blocks_size)
00138         {
00139             STXXL_VERBOSE1("write_pool::steal : " << free_blocks_size << " free blocks available");
00140             --free_blocks_size;
00141             block_type * p = free_blocks.back();
00142             free_blocks.pop_back();
00143             return p;
00144         }
00145         STXXL_VERBOSE1("write_pool::steal : all " << busy_blocks_size << " are busy");
00146         busy_blocks_iterator completed = wait_any(busy_blocks.begin(), busy_blocks.end());
00147         assert(completed != busy_blocks.end()); // we got something reasonable from wait_any
00148         assert(completed->req->poll()); // and it is *really* completed
00149         block_type * p = completed->block;
00150         busy_blocks.erase(completed);
00151         --busy_blocks_size;
00152         check_all_busy(); // for debug
00153         return p;
00154     }
00155 
00156     // deprecated name for the steal()
00157     block_type * get()
00158     {
00159         return steal();
00160     }
00161 
00164     void resize(unsigned_type new_size)
00165     {
00166         int_type diff = int_type(new_size) - int_type(size());
00167         if (diff > 0 )
00168         {
00169             free_blocks_size += diff;
00170             while (--diff >= 0)
00171                 free_blocks.push_back(new block_type);
00172 
00173 
00174             return;
00175         }
00176 
00177         while (++diff <= 0)
00178             delete get();
00179     }
00180 
00181     request_ptr get_request(bid_type bid)
00182     {
00183         busy_blocks_iterator i2 = busy_blocks.begin();
00184         for ( ; i2 != busy_blocks.end(); ++i2)
00185         {
00186             if (i2->bid == bid)
00187                 return i2->req;
00188         }
00189         return request_ptr();
00190     }
00191 
00192 
00193     block_type * steal(bid_type bid)
00194     {
00195         busy_blocks_iterator i2 = busy_blocks.begin();
00196         for ( ; i2 != busy_blocks.end(); ++i2)
00197         {
00198             if (i2->bid == bid)
00199             {
00200                 block_type * p = i2->block;
00201                 i2->req->wait();
00202                 busy_blocks.erase(i2);
00203                 --busy_blocks_size;
00204                 return p;
00205             }
00206         }
00207         return NULL;
00208     }
00209 
00210     void add(block_type * block)
00211     {
00212         free_blocks.push_back(block);
00213         ++free_blocks_size;
00214     }
00215 protected:
00216     void check_all_busy()
00217     {
00218         busy_blocks_iterator cur = busy_blocks.begin();
00219         int_type cnt = 0;
00220 #if STXXL_VERBOSE_LEVEL > 0
00221         int_type busy_blocks_size_old = busy_blocks_size;
00222 #endif
00223         for ( ; cur != busy_blocks.end(); ++cur)
00224         {
00225             if (cur->req->poll())
00226             {
00227                 free_blocks.push_back(cur->block);
00228                 busy_blocks.erase(cur);
00229                 cur = busy_blocks.begin();
00230                 ++cnt;
00231                 --busy_blocks_size;
00232                 ++free_blocks_size;
00233                 if (busy_blocks.empty())
00234                     break;
00235             }
00236         }
00237         STXXL_VERBOSE1("write_pool::check_all_busy : " << cnt <<
00238                        " are completed out of " << busy_blocks_size_old << " busy blocks");
00239     }
00240 };
00241 
00243 
00244 __STXXL_END_NAMESPACE

00247 namespace std
00248 {
00249     template <class BlockType>
00250     void swap(stxxl::write_pool < BlockType > & a,
00251               stxxl::write_pool<BlockType> & b)
00252     {
00253         a.swap(b);
00254     }
00255 }
